attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Official DNA test results show conclusively that around 1/3 of paternity claims are fraudulent. 

Given that the average cost of raising a child is estimated at £150,000, this amounts to billions of pounds of criminal fraud, wrecked homes, and emotional trauma.

Paternity fraud could be cheaply, easily and completely abolished by the introduction of free paternity tests.

The state rightly provides free maternity pay, grants, prescriptions, milk, and supplements. But millions of victims of paternity crime receive no help.

We believe that the government should prevent paternity fraud by introducing free paternity tests, by legally enforcing compliance with these tests, by criminalizing paternity fraudsters, and by supporting victims who wish to legally reclaim stolen funds.
